column5: It was always an isolated, quiet, out of the way place, it isn't listed on the Prov Parks website anymore, just wondering if they closed it? Can you still drive in there? It was a pretty cool place to camp/ fish, black bear city though.
Nothing's changed Chris. On the Ontario Parks website the Barclay bay campground is lumped in with the Missinaibi River page.  Go to that page then click on campsites.
